content: real easy raglan this raglan sweater is designed to be really easy hence the name and would be a great project for first-time garment knitters with it s relaxed and comfortable fit you will find yourself reaching for this sweater often and it s simplicity makes it a fantastic wardrobe staple the pattern includes detailed instructions with some handy extra tips for newbies starting at the neck the sweater is knit top-down on circular needles which is a great method to check the fit as you go and is very easy to add or subtract length there are also optional short-row to shape the neck but if you want to keep things super simple just leave them on out i hope you enjoy knitting your own real easy raglan emily 1 real easy raglan v1 2 | designed by emily bolduan © maker maker 2021
